attributes.action: Benefit claimants should conduct community services for the local governments.
attributes.additional_details:
This will go towards there cv too as voluntary worker, they could work in charity shops, old people homes, gardeners.
Other eu locations have this in place and works.
attributes.background:
With cuts too our local governments findings, for street cleaners, general cleaners and other essential works.
The benefit recipients should conduct community services too allow them to claim benefits.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/124828
